para_sentences.para_0: There are numerous problems out in the world, we should be able to tell when we cannot write a polynomial-time solution for a problem.
para_sentences.para_1: In Question 1, you will prove that a given problem is NP-Complete. (MLO2)
para_sentences.para_2: In Question 2, you will implement a heuristic algorithm for an NP-Hard problem. (MLO3)

para_sentences.para_0: Download the assignment questions from this assignment file.
You will turn in the submission files via Canvas and Gradescope.
para_sentences.para_1: All your answers other than python code files will be turned in through thisCanvas assignment in a pdf file.
para_sentences.para_2: The python files to be submitted on Gradescope:

ol_0: Write a Heuristic Algorithm [10 points]  Graph representation [1 point] Applying Heuristic [2 point] Approximation Ratio [2 point] Implementation [5 point]
